series_description: This series consists of batch sheets for records to initiate monetary changes to the Retired Annuitant Payroll System (RAPS) and document that the changes were made.
retention_statement: Retain in agency 1 year or until APA audit, transfer to Records Center, Library of Virginia for 6 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page. Total retention 7 years.

series_description: This series consists of reports generated from data entry of VSDP payroll. CORE is the third party administrator used to reconcile disability payroll payments.
retention_statement: Retain in agency 1 year, transfer to Records Center, Library of Virginia for 6 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page. Total retention 7 years.

series_description: This series consists of records to initiate changes to the Retired Annuitant Payroll System (RAPS) and document that the changes were made. Includes demographic data used for research to complete retirement calculations.
retention_statement: Retain in agency 1 year or until APA audit, transfer to Records Center, Library of Virginia for 6 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page. Total retention 7 years.

series_description: This series documents invoices and changes to health carriers.
retention_statement: Retain in agency 1 year or until APA audit, transfer to Records Center, Library of Virginia for 6 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page. Total retention 7 years.

series_description: This series consists of optional life insurance reports generated by the third party administrator used to reconcile life insurance payments. This schedule supersedes 158-032 dated 8/21/2003
retention_statement: Retain in agency 1 year, transfer to Records Center, Library of Virginia for 6 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page. Total retention 7 years.
Retain in agency 1 year or until APA audit, transfer to Records Center, Library of Virginia for 6 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page. Total retention 7 years.

series_description: Reporting System (VIPERS) payroll system for retirees. This form includes information such as total amounts paid to the retiree and any taxes withheld. May be in paper or CD format. IRS revenue code section 7203,7204; IRS section 33.6001
retention_statement: Retain 7 years after end of the fiscal year then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.
